description.raw:
This PR enables the Feature System to account for arbitrary joint types. This means it will also be able to support custom joint types that `ign-physics` does not natively know about. Physics engines can also add custom features to existing joint types.

This same methodology can be used later on for various Shape types \(including any custom Shape types that a physics engine might have\).

There is still some cleanup to do for this PR, mostly documenting classes and functions, but the implementation and tests are finished for RevoluteJoint.

If anyone feels like trying to implement another joint type, you can use the `ignition/physics/RevoluteJoint.hh` file for reference.

There is still some cleanup to do for this PR, mostly documenting classes and functions, but the implementation and tests are finished for RevoluteJoint.

If anyone feels like trying to implement another joint type, you can use the ignition/physics/RevoluteJoint.hh file for reference.
